executive_summary.name: Executive Summary
executive_summary.prompt:
Return a single 4–5 line analytical paragraph (≈60–90 words) that uses ONLY values from investmentproposal_processed.json, company_analysis_output.json, and gmr_stock_analysis.json. The paragraph must include:
- One-line business intro (what GMR does)
- FY24 revenue and FY25P revenue (keys)
- EBITDA FY24 & FY25P and margins (keys)
- Stock short metrics: 30-day return %, 30-day volatility %, avg daily volume, and price provenance (exchange + timestamp) — use only provided values
- A one-line 'Keys used:' footer listing exact JSON keys (no values)

If a value is missing, write 'data unavailable' for that item. Return ONLY the paragraph + footer line.

financial_performance.name: Financial Performance (condensed)
financial_performance.prompt:
After generating dashboard_financial_overview.png, return a 4–5 line paragraph (≈60–90 words) that:
- Summarizes Revenue FY24 & FY25P, EBITDA FY24 & FY25P, and Interest Coverage (include exact keys)
- Provides one sentence on Operating CF vs Capex sufficiency (use Operating CF & Capex keys; agent may compute but must show formula)
- Conclude with one short sentence on immediate financial concern (one phrase)
- Footer: 'Keys used:' listing extraction keys (no values)

Do NOT repeat chart instructions. Return only paragraph + footer.

balance_debt.name: Balance Sheet & Debt (condensed)
balance_debt.prompt:
After creating dashboard_debt_liquidity.png, return a 4–5 line paragraph that:
- States Total Assets, Total Debt, Net Worth (FY24 & FY25P keys) and shows Debt-to-Equity and Debt-to-EBITDA formulas (agent may compute derived ratios and must show formula and keys)
- One short sentence on short-term debt concentration and liquidity gauge (keys)
- Footer: 'Keys used:' listing extraction keys

Return only the paragraph + footer.

operational_performance.name: Operational Performance (condensed)
operational_performance.prompt:
After producing dashboard_operations_capacity.png, return a 4–5 line paragraph that:
- Notes Passenger traffic FY24 and FY25P with growth % (agent may compute growth and must show formula and keys)
- Summarizes airport capacity utilization for Delhi and Hyderabad (keys) and call out any headroom risk
- One short line on non-aero revenue direction (use % split key if present; otherwise 'data unavailable')
- Footer: 'Keys used:' listing extraction keys

Return only the paragraph + footer.

projects_funding.name: Projects & Funding (condensed)
projects_funding.prompt:
After generating dashboard_projects_funding.png, return a 4–5 line paragraph that:
- States Total Capex pipeline and top project amounts (keys)
- Provides Funding Gap KPI value or 'data unavailable' if missing (show formula & keys)
- One short line on execution risk (mention largest project and status)
- Footer: 'Keys used:' listing extraction keys

Return only the paragraph + footer.

valuation_risk.name: Valuation & Risk (condensed)
valuation_risk.prompt:
After creating dashboard_valuation_risk.png, return a tight 4-line insight:
- State EV/EBITDA, P/B, Market Cap (keys) and a one-line valuation concern
- List top-2 risk drivers (financial, execution) with keys
- Footer: 'Keys used:' listing extraction keys

Return only the 4-line insight + footer.

governance_esg.name: Governance & ESG (condensed)
governance_esg.prompt:
Return a 4–5 line paragraph summarizing:
- Auditor opinion & board composition highlight (keys)
- Regulatory compliance status (SEBI, AERA, DGCA) and any recent penalties (keys or 'no penalties' if none)
- Litigation / contingent liabilities % of net worth (keys or 'data unavailable')
- Footer: 'Keys used:' listing extraction keys

Return only paragraph + footer.
